text:
Shaper Tools | San Francisco, CA | Full-time, ONSITE

At Shaper we are developing a revolutionary line of computer-augmented power tools, starting with a handheld CNC router called Origin. We're growing in 2017 and need help from skilled software and mechanical engineers to help us build the future of power tools. We are currently a SF based team of experts with backgrounds in robotics, woodworking, film, computer vision, and design.

More about us: https://shapertools.com

https://shapertools.com/careers/

Front End Engineer | Back End Engineer | UX/UI | Embedded Software Engineer | System Software Engineer | Product Design Engineer
